title: Chronicles of the Virago Book II The Apprentus
description: COMING SOON!!!!!!!!The Follow up to The Chronicles of the Virago Book IMakenna Gold is just beginning to get used to her role as the 'Virago'; the Protector of her twin siblings Emilyne and Noah, and the hope for our worlds future. The forces of evil however are not content to sit idly by. Billionaire Malvado Seaton, has conspired to to send the Gold family away from there Pasadena home base and send them off to China, thereby making them more vulnerable. With the aid of his minion the Red Dragon, Seaton intends to infiltrate the Gold family, destroy the Virago, kidnap the twins and corrupt them to use for his own evil purposes. Can Makenna, her fairies, family and friends even hope to overcome the odds that are stacked against, or can a special new guest help Makenna even the playing field.
author: Michael Bialys
